## replaceVarFromString() function

替换字符串中的插值变量

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function replaceVarFromString(
  sourceStr: string,
  targetObj: Record<string, any>,
  leftMatchSymbol?: string,
  rightMatchSymbol?: string
): string;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter        | Type                      | Description                                    |
| ---------------- | ------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| sourceStr        | string                    |                                                |
| targetObj        | Record&lt;string, any&gt; |                                                |
| leftMatchSymbol  | string                    | _(Optional)_ 变量左侧匹配符号，默认：<!-- -->{ |
| rightMatchSymbol | string                    | _(Optional)_ 变量右侧匹配符号，默认：<!-- -->} |

**Returns:**

string

string
